actions.title: Soil Health Assessment
actions.instructions: Measure soil moisture, pH, and organic matter content using provided testing kit. Document findings with photos and measurements.

actions.title: Biodiversity Survey
actions.instructions: Conduct a comprehensive survey of plant and animal species in the garden area. Use iNaturalist app for species identification.

actions.title: Carbon Sequestration Measurement
actions.instructions: Measure tree diameter at breast height (DBH) and calculate carbon storage potential using provided formulas.
